alert.note: Alert for Benton; Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:53PM CST until March 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch possible. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Morrison, Mille Lacs, Kanabec and Benton Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM Saturday to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
